verses.name: John 8:52
verses.text: Then said the Jews unto him, Now we know that thou hast a devil. Abraham is dead, and the prophets; and thou sayest, If a man keep my saying, he shall never taste of death.

verses.name: John 8:53
verses.text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham, which is dead? and the prophets are dead: whom makest thou thyself?

verses.name: John 8:54
verses.text: Jesus answered, If I honour myself, my honour is nothing: it is my Father that honoureth me; of whom ye say, that he is your God:
